TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void OdbcRowUpdatedEventHandler(object sender, OdbcRowUpdatedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed OdbcRowUpdatedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub OdbcRowUpdatedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As OdbcRowUpdatedEventArgs)
public delegate void OdbcRowUpdatedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, OdbcRowUpdatedEventArgs ^ e);
type OdbcRowUpdatedEventHandler = delegate of obj * OdbcRowUpdatedEventArgs -> unit

span.span: The that contains the event data.

summary.span: 代表將處理 的 事件之方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 處理常式不需要執行任何動作，並產生例外狀況或允許例外狀況傳播到呼叫的方法，應該避免您的程式碼。The handler is not required to perform any action, and your code should avoid generating exceptions or allowing exceptions to propagate to the calling method. 執行到呼叫端的任何例外狀況會被忽略。Any exceptions that do reach the caller are ignored. 當您建立 委派 (Delegate) 時，就可以識別即將處理此事件的方法。When you create an delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需有關事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)
